Class USB_Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ailis.usb4java.jni.USB_Device

  • public final class USB_Device
extends Object
    USB Device.
    Author:
    Klaus Reimer (k@ailis.de)

      • devnum

        public short devnum()
        Returns the device number. The original data type for this information is an unsigned byte. This wrapper returns a short int instead to avoid problems with values larger then 127.
        Returns:
        The device number (unsigned byte).

      • num_children

        public short num_children()
        Returns the number of child devices. The original data type for this information is an unsigned byte. This wrapper returns a short int instead to avoid problems with values larger then 127.
        Returns:
        The number of child devices (unsigned byte).
